{"id":798969814,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1663090431,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"78 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/798969814/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"13.5 MB","code":"class Solution(object):\n    def convert(self, s, numRows):\n        \"\"\"\n        :type s: str\n        :type numRows: int\n        :rtype: str\n        \"\"\"\n        if numRows == 1 or numRows >= len(s):\n         return s\n\n        lists = [''] * numRows\n        index, step = 0, 1\n        for char in s:\n            lists[index] += char\n            if index == 0:\n                step = 1\n            if index == numRows - 1:\n                step = -1\n            index += step\n\n        return ''.join(lists)   \n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
